qas.question: WHo established an elite knightly retinue?
How long was Miesko I of Poland reigning?
Along with uniting the lekhitic tribes what did poland succeed in?

answers.text: preserving the unity of his state

qas.question: Who also established this retinue as well?

context: <a0_0>Mieszko I of Poland<a0_0/> <a1_0>(c. 935 – 25 May 992)<a1_0/> established an elite knightly retinue from within his army, which he depended upon for success in uniting the Lekhitic tribes and <a2_0>preserving the unity of his state<a2_0/>. Documented proof exists of <a3_0>Mieszko I's successors<a3_0/> utilizing such a retinue, as well.
